name: Scott Williams
description: Hi! I’m looking for someone fun and honest to share the rest of my life with, do things with and get to know. I’m fun, adventurous and love to do many different things. I don’t smoke and drink very little and occasionally. The bar scene is really not for me. I am a foodie and love trying new places. I like a woman who is chivalrous and can handle her business. I love animals and have a dog i call Zimba Lol. If that’s an issue for you, please come along with me!!!
